chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Samsung S21 Ultra is having the following issue:

After updating on May 19, 2024, my SIM card was lost and it won't charge anymore.

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

Your customer has returned their item and based on follow-up, it looks like you received it on: 05/23/24.

1. Your customer has requested a repair.

2. He indicated that the technical condition of his item is DEFECTIVE: 

- the device has charging problems
- eSIM cannot be enabled

Be sure to take the next step within the time frame set by our quality charter.  

Sincerly,

Faratiana 
Back Market customer Care

Hi ecomobile,

Your customer has returned their item and based on follow-up, it looks like you received it on: 05/23/24.

Be sure to take the next step within the time frame set by our quality charter.

Sincerly,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
